verses.verse: I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H8104>watch<s%> my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> so that I <S%H2398>don't<s%> sin with my <S%H3956>tongue.<s%> I will <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> with a <S%H4269>bridle<s%> while the wicked is before <S%H7563>me.<s%>"
I was <S%H481>mute<s%> with <S%H1747>silence.<s%> I held my <S%H2814>peace,<s%> even from <S%H2896>good.<s%> My <S%H3511>sorrow<s%> was <S%H5916>stirred.<s%>

My <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H2552>hot<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> <S%H1901>me.<s%> While I meditated, the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1197>burned:<s%> <S%H227><s%> I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with my <S%H3956>tongue:<s%>
<S%H3068>"Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3045>show<s%> me my <S%H7093>end,<s%> what is the <S%H4060>measure<s%> of my <S%H3117>days.<s%> Let me <S%H3045>know<s%> how frail I <S%H2310>am.<s%>

<S%H5414>Behold,<s%> you have made my <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H2947>handbreadths.<s%> My <S%H2465>lifetime<s%> is as nothing before <S%H3605>you.<s%> Surely every <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5324>stands<s%> <S%H3605>as<s%> a <S%H1892>breath.<s%>" <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

"Surely every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> like a <S%H6754>shadow.<s%> Surely they <S%H1993>busy<s%> themselves in <S%H1892>vain.<s%> He heaps <S%H6651>up,<s%> and <S%H3045>doesn't<s%> know who shall <S%H622>gather.<s%>
<S%H136>Now,<s%> Lord, what do I <S%H6960>wait<s%> <S%H8431>for?<s%> My hope is in you.
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from all my <S%H6588>transgressions.<s%> <S%H7760>Don't<s%> make me the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of the <S%H5036>foolish.<s%>
I was <S%H481>mute.<s%> I <S%H6605>didn't<s%> open my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> because you did <S%H6213>it.<s%>
<S%H5493>Remove<s%> your <S%H5061>scourge<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from <S%H3615>me.<s%> I am overcome by the <S%H8409>blow<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

When you <S%H8433>rebuke<s%> and <S%H3256>correct<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> for <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> You <S%H4529>consume<s%> his <S%H2530>wealth<s%> like a <S%H6211>moth.<s%> Surely every <S%H120>man<s%> is but a <S%H1892>breath.<s%>" <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H8085>"Hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and give <S%H238>ear<s%> to my <S%H7775>cry.<s%> <S%H2790>Don't<s%> be silent at my <S%H1832>tears.<s%> For I am a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> with <S%H8453>you,<s%> a foreigner, as all my fathers <S%H1>were.<s%>
Oh <S%H8159>spare<s%> <S%H1082>me,<s%> that I may recover strength, before I go <S%H3212>away,<s%> and exist no more."
